name: @stefanoa1/license-scanner
description: A high-performance npm package that scans project dependencies to detect and report their licenses

scripts.build:all: GOOS=darwin GOARCH=arm64 go build -o bin/license-scanner-darwin-arm64 ./cmd/scanner && GOOS=darwin GOARCH=amd64 go build -o bin/license-scanner-darwin-amd64 ./cmd/scanner && GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 go build -o bin/license-scanner-linux-amd64 ./cmd/scanner && GOOS=linux GOARCH=arm64 go build -o bin/license-scanner-linux-arm64 ./cmd/scanner && GOOS=windows GOARCH=amd64 go build -o bin/license-scanner-windows-amd64.exe ./cmd/scanner
scripts.test: pnpm run format && pnpm run lint && pnpm run test:go && pnpm run test:e2e
scripts.test:e2e: pnpm add express lodash && pnpm run build:go && node lib/cli.js && pnpm remove express lodash && rm -rf node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml
scripts.prepublish: npm run build:all && npm run test

author: Stefano Acosta
